text: Soni naga mundu chili chinkwayiye chakusausya akasatuwendaga ali agonile chamumbalati mwakwe, kapena chitamile, kapena chiimile, basi ndema jatukuntyochesyaga chakusausya chakwecho akwendelechelaga (mu ukafili wakwe) nti chisawu nganatuwendeje pa chakusausya chachankwayiye, iyyoyopeyo ni yaitite pakunonyelesyedwa kwa akupelenganya malile (pa sambi) ya awele ali nkupanganya
